description: Petrol variant of eighth-generation 5-series lacks traits which made its forebears appealing. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Car review: BMW 520i fails to outshine electric twin
title_page: Car review: BMW 520i fails to outshine electric twin | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE â€“ I sometimes wonder what it feels like to be cloned.
Will I know that I have been cloned? Will I have all the memories and feelings of my original self? How do I know if I am not already a clone?
